about.part1: Hello, my name is Brett Tanonaka and I am a full stack developer. Prior to engineering, I was a video producer for almost 10 years. When I was exploring motion design, I discovered After Effects Expressions, a JavaScript based animation language, and saw what is possible with code. Today, I use my experience with design to build end-to-end applications that are user-focused, intuitive, and scalable.

about.part1: Hello, my name is Brett Tanonaka and I am a video producer with over 10 years of experience, primarily focused on short form content. I have created videos for documentaries, internal communication, social media, and advertisements, for a range of industries such as retail, automotive, ed-tech, and social activist non-profits.
about.part2: I specialize in video editing and motion design but have also dabbled in directing, studio management, and camera operating. In 2022 I began exploring software engineering and learned how powerful it can be to animate using algorithms.

intro.sec: They have more in common than you may expect.
